# ashu-test-pkg-001

Experimental Python package for research and educational purposes.

## Status
- Experimental
- Proof-of-concept
- Not intended for production use

## Installation
```bash
pip install ashu-test-pkg-001
```

## Usage
```python
from ashu-test-pkg-001.core import hello
print(hello())
```

## Disclaimer
This package is provided for research and educational purposes only.
